Name: Panty Load
About the game: Panty Load is an arcade inspired, casual game, reminiscent of early 80's style gameplay. You play as a woman who's looking for a little release to help get you through the day. As your player walks back and forth, you decide when to release your Load. You collect points based on the number of Loads you catch in your panties. You navigate between life's obstacles with your Load to reach the goal. You collect points based on the number of Loads you catch. Drop down your Load, controlling when to wait to avoid obstacles, and when you want to push on for the panty! Your frustration level will build if you get distracted/hit by the obstacles. When your frustration hits 10, it's Game Over. Changing environments for the player! Multiple difficulty levels! In game achievement system! Character customization!
